DIF.content: differance: gross spelling mistake
DIF.linkedContent: differance: gross spelling mistake

DIF.content: differance neither a word nor a concept, à la lettre > impossible (for essential reasons) to gather (rassembler) all usages of differance in a sheaf (en faisceau)
DIF.linkedContent: differance neither a word nor a concept, à la lettre > impossible (for essential reasons) to gather (rassembler) all usages of differance in a sheaf (en faisceau)

DIF.content: the capital “a” of differance, a pyramid [A]; Hegel: body of sign is Egyptian pyramid > Derrida moves from pyramid to tomb, oikēsis > tomb of proper, familial residence, economy of death (this stone announces death of tyrant [cf. TN.]) [this tomb can’t even be made to resonate]
DIF.linkedContent: the capital “a” of differance, a pyramid [A]; Hegel: body of sign is Egyptian pyramid > Derrida moves from pyramid to tomb, oikēsis > tomb of proper, familial residence, economy of death (this stone announces death of tyrant [cf. TN.]) [this tomb can’t even be made to resonate]

DIF.content: [re: differance] that pyramidal silence btwn “e” and “a” can only function in phonetic writing reminds us there’s no pure phonetic writing (functions by admitting nonphonetic “signs”: punctuation, spacing)
DIF.linkedContent: [re: differance] that pyramidal silence btwn “e” and “a” can only function in phonetic writing reminds us there’s no pure phonetic writing (functions by admitting nonphonetic “signs”: punctuation, spacing)

DIF.content: differance that establishes phonemes, lets them be heard (les donne à entendre), is inaudible
DIF.linkedContent: differance that establishes phonemes, lets them be heard (les donne à entendre), is inaudible

DIF.content: an order neither of sensibility nor intelligibility, can not be seen nor heard > [to see (theōrein) as understanding, to hear (entendement) as understanding]
DIF.linkedContent: an order neither of sensibility nor intelligibility, can not be seen nor heard > [to see (theōrein) as understanding, to hear (entendement) as understanding]

DIF.content: differance is btwn speech/writing, beyond the link that reassures us of the illusion that they   (speech/writing) are 2
DIF.linkedContent: differance is btwn speech/writing, beyond the link that reassures us of the illusion that they (speech/writing) are 2

DIF.content: if differance is [Heidegger’s Durchstreichung of Being], it reserves itself, never offered to the present: exceeds order of truth, not a hole in topology of castration [p. 21 differance is not]
DIF.linkedContent: if differance is [Heidegger’s Durchstreichung of Being], it reserves itself, never offered to the present: exceeds order of truth, not a hole in topology of castration [p. 21 differance is not]

DIF.content: detours, locutions, syntax used to describe differance will resemble negative theology to the point of being indistinguishable > but there’s no superessentiality beyond
DIF.linkedContent: detours, locutions, syntax used to describe differance will resemble negative theology to the point of being indistinguishable > but there’s no superessentiality beyond

DIF.content: differance is not, neither existence nor essence: inscribes & exceeds ontotheology w/out return
DIF.linkedContent: differance is not, neither existence nor essence: inscribes & exceeds ontotheology w/out return

DIF.content: differance must be superseded, not considered arkhē of chain, thus not theological
DIF.linkedContent: differance must be superseded, not considered arkhē of chain, thus not theological

DIF.content: delineating differance is strategic & adventurous: 1) strategic: because no transcendent truth outside the field can govern (theologically) the totality of the field 2) adventurous: because this strategy has no goal, no telos, strategy w/out finality, blind tactics
DIF.linkedContent: delineating differance is strategic & adventurous: 1) strategic: because no transcendent truth outside the field can govern (theologically) the totality of the field 2) adventurous: because this strategy has no goal, no telos, strategy w/out finality, blind tactics

DIF.content: chain in which differance lends itself to nonsynonymous substitutions: reserve, arch-writing, archi-trace, spacing, supplement, pharmakon, hymen, margin-mark-march
DIF.linkedContent: chain in which differance lends itself to nonsynonymous substitutions: reserve, arch-writing, archi-trace, spacing, supplement, pharmakon, hymen, margin-mark-march

DIF.content: Latin differre has 2 meanings: 1) the common one, not identical, interval, spacing, allergic or polemical otherness 2) delay, relay, reserve, that which suspends fulfillment of “will”; Greek diapherein does not imply temporization, detour, delay
DIF.linkedContent: Latin differre has 2 meanings: 1) the common one, not identical, interval, spacing, allergic or polemical otherness 2) delay, relay, reserve, that which suspends fulfillment of “will”; Greek diapherein does not imply temporization, detour, delay

DIF.content: strategically differance seemed most proper one [?] to think/master, though maintained w/in structural limits of mastery
DIF.linkedContent: strategically differance seemed most proper one [?] to think/master, though maintained w/in structural limits of mastery

DIF.content: differance: defers itself more readily than other words
DIF.linkedContent: differance: defers itself more readily than other words

DIF.content: differance, middle voice > -ance remains undecided btwn active & passive (i.e. resonance is not the act of resonating), neutralizes what infinitive denotes as active
DIF.linkedContent: differance, middle voice > -ance remains undecided btwn active & passive (i.e. resonance is not the act of resonating), neutralizes what infinitive denotes as active

DIF.content: classically, sign is treated as deferred presence, as differance of temporization > sign is thus provisional, secondary > but Derrida is questioning this logic: to think originary differance, one would have to recognize origin, archi-, telos, eskhaton have always denoted presence: ousia, parousia
DIF.linkedContent: classically, sign is treated as deferred presence, as differance of temporization > sign is thus provisional, secondary > but Derrida is questioning this logic: to think originary differance, one would have to recognize origin, archi-, telos, eskhaton have always denoted presence: ousia, parousia

DIF.content: differance not included in concept of a sign, which has always meant representation of a presence
DIF.linkedContent: differance not included in concept of a sign, which has always meant representation of a presence

DIF.content: [re: differance] Derrida in strict communication w/ Heidegger re: liberating question of Being from domination by present/now—but Heidegger is not exhaustive
DIF.linkedContent: [re: differance] Derrida in strict communication w/ Heidegger re: liberating question of Being from domination by present/now—but Heidegger is not exhaustive

DIF.content: differance no more static than genetic, no more structural than historical
DIF.linkedContent: differance no more static than genetic, no more structural than historical

DIF.content: [differance’s relation to trace] differance makes signification possible by assuring each “present” element relates to something other than itself, a trace of the future or past element
DIF.linkedContent: [differance’s relation to trace] differance makes signification possible by assuring each “present” element relates to something other than itself, a trace of the future or past element

DIF.content: differance constitutes present in interval, constitutes present by dividing it > everything thus thought on basis of the present, in our metaphysical language, would also be divided (subject, substance, being, etc.)
DIF.linkedContent: differance constitutes present in interval, constitutes present by dividing it > everything thus thought on basis of the present, in our metaphysical language, would also be divided (subject, substance, being, etc.)

DIF.content: differance as radical, infinitesimal displacement of Hegelian discourse (while maintaining profound affinity)
DIF.linkedContent: differance as radical, infinitesimal displacement of Hegelian discourse (while maintaining profound affinity)

DIF.content: answer to “what is differance?” (w/out turning question back on itself) would reassert MOP
DIF.linkedContent: answer to “what is differance?” (w/out turning question back on itself) would reassert MOP

DIF.content: if Saussure’s opposition speech/language is rigorous, differance would be play of differences w/in language & relation of speech/language, the detour, the silent promise I must make to speak (but differance forbids this essential dissociation: archi-writing before the letter)
DIF.linkedContent: if Saussure’s opposition speech/language is rigorous, differance would be play of differences w/in language & relation of speech/language, the detour, the silent promise I must make to speak (but differance forbids this essential dissociation: archi-writing before the letter)

DIF.content: system of differance no longer tolerates oppositions passive/active, indeterminate/determinate, cause/effect  > consciousness as “effect” or “determination” w/in system of differance: strategically, one continues to operate acc. lexicon one is de-limiting
DIF.linkedContent: system of differance no longer tolerates oppositions passive/active, indeterminate/determinate, cause/effect > consciousness as “effect” or “determination” w/in system of differance: strategically, one continues to operate acc. lexicon one is de-limiting

DIF.content: before Heidegger purposely and radically questioned presence, Freud & Nietzsche did so, and, remarkably, they did so via motif of differance [remarkable :)]
DIF.linkedContent: before Heidegger purposely and radically questioned presence, Freud & Nietzsche did so, and, remarkably, they did so via motif of differance [remarkable :)]

DIF.content: Nietzsche: “difference of quantity is the essence of force, the relation of force to force” > “isn’t all Nietzsche’s thought a critique of philosophy as an active indifference to difference, as the system of adiaphoristic reduction or repression?”: this doesn’t exclude that philosophy lives in/on differance
DIF.linkedContent: Nietzsche: “difference of quantity is the essence of force, the relation of force to force” > “isn’t all Nietzsche’s thought a critique of philosophy as an active indifference to difference, as the system of adiaphoristic reduction or repression?”: this doesn’t exclude that philosophy lives in/on differance

DIF.content: if we were to think not the erasure of opposition but why each term must appear as differance of the other [long list of classical oppositions: i.e. physis/mimēsis] > we see announced sameness of differance and repetition in the eternal return
DIF.linkedContent: if we were to think not the erasure of opposition but why each term must appear as differance of the other [long list of classical oppositions: i.e. physis/mimēsis] > we see announced sameness of differance and repetition in the eternal return

DIF.content: differance as “active,” as Nietzsche’s incessant interpretation, system of figures not dominated by value of truth
DIF.linkedContent: differance as “active,” as Nietzsche’s incessant interpretation, system of figures not dominated by value of truth

DIF.content: “Freud’s diaphoristics”: Spur and Bahnung in Freud: inseparable from differance, no breach w/out difference, no difference w/out trace: movement of trace, in Freud, a protection, deferring danger by constituting a reserve (Vorrat) > each of Freud’s concepts a detour in economy of differance
DIF.linkedContent: “Freud’s diaphoristics”: Spur and Bahnung in Freud: inseparable from differance, no breach w/out difference, no difference w/out trace: movement of trace, in Freud, a protection, deferring danger by constituting a reserve (Vorrat) > each of Freud’s concepts a detour in economy of differance

DIF.content: in Beyond Pleas…, difference btwn pleasure/reality principle is only differance as detour [if “only,” then not differance as relation to impossible presence?]
DIF.linkedContent: in Beyond Pleas…, difference btwn pleasure/reality principle is only differance as detour [if “only,” then not differance as relation to impossible presence?]

DIF.content: Derrida well aware of evidential calculations that will dismiss illogicality of differance, their necessity, function, is part of differance > rigorous, “scientific” relating of restricted economy (takes no part in expenditure w/out reserve) & general economy (keeps nonreserve in reserve)
DIF.linkedContent: Derrida well aware of evidential calculations that will dismiss illogicality of differance, their necessity, function, is part of differance > rigorous, “scientific” relating of restricted economy (takes no part in expenditure w/out reserve) & general economy (keeps nonreserve in reserve)

DIF.content: this “scientific” relating: a relationship btwn a differance that makes a profit on its investment, and a differance that misses its profit, la mise de la présence pure et sans perte se confondant avec celle de la perte absolue, de la mort [pure presence and pure loss merge w/ each other]
DIF.linkedContent: this “scientific” relating: a relationship btwn a differance that makes a profit on its investment, and a differance that misses its profit, la mise de la présence pure et sans perte se confondant avec celle de la perte absolue, de la mort [pure presence and pure loss merge w/ each other]

DIF.content: Levinas’ trace, enigma of absolute alterity (a past never present), solicits domination of beings (w/in these limits, differance implies Levinas’ entire critique of classical ontology)
DIF.linkedContent: Levinas’ trace, enigma of absolute alterity (a past never present), solicits domination of beings (w/in these limits, differance implies Levinas’ entire critique of classical ontology)

DIF.content: cannot think trace (therefore differance) on basis of presence: refers to a past never present
DIF.linkedContent: cannot think trace (therefore differance) on basis of presence: refers to a past never present

DIF.content: differance not announced by capital letter, it subverts all kingdoms > everything w/in us that wants a kingdom (le royaume) (that wants to capitalize) fears differance
DIF.linkedContent: differance not announced by capital letter, it subverts all kingdoms > everything w/in us that wants a kingdom (le royaume) (that wants to capitalize) fears differance

DIF.content: differance (is) older than ontological difference: outside epochality of Being (outside epoch): no depth to bottomless chessboard on which Being is put to play
DIF.linkedContent: differance (is) older than ontological difference: outside epochality of Being (outside epoch): no depth to bottomless chessboard on which Being is put to play

DIF.content: isn’t the determination of differance as ontico-ontological difference, difference w/in horizon of question of Being, still intrametaphysical effects of differance?
DIF.linkedContent: isn’t the determination of differance as ontico-ontological difference, difference w/in horizon of question of Being, still intrametaphysical effects of differance?

DIF.content: differance would be play of trace which no longer belongs to horizon of Being
DIF.linkedContent: differance would be play of trace which no longer belongs to horizon of Being

DIF.content: a trace that can never appear in phenomenon: trace beyond link btwn ontology & phenomenology > trace erases itself, muffles itself in resonating, like the “a” inscribing its pyramid in differance
DIF.linkedContent: a trace that can never appear in phenomenon: trace beyond link btwn ontology & phenomenology > trace erases itself, muffles itself in resonating, like the “a” inscribing its pyramid in differance

DIF.content: differance never be appropriated by “as such,” threatens authority of “as such,” presence of thing itself in its essence
DIF.linkedContent: differance never be appropriated by “as such,” threatens authority of “as such,” presence of thing itself in its essence

DIF.content: differance not a process of propriation, neither “species” of genus Being nor Ereignis (nor ontological difference): neither appropriation (position), nor expropriation (negation)—it is other
DIF.linkedContent: differance not a process of propriation, neither “species” of genus Being nor Ereignis (nor ontological difference): neither appropriation (position), nor expropriation (negation)—it is other

DIF.content: [Derrida argues for new relation  to unnameable, different from Heidegger’s] “no name” for differance is not ineffable Being which no name could approach (i.e. God), it is play which makes possible nominal effects, the chains of substitutions of names
DIF.linkedContent: [Derrida argues for new relation to unnameable, different from Heidegger’s] “no name” for differance is not ineffable Being which no name could approach (i.e. God), it is play which makes possible nominal effects, the chains of substitutions of names

DIF.content: to know there’s nothing kerygmatic [not a master-name] about differance, we must perceive its decapita(liza)tion > must put into question the name of the name
DIF.linkedContent: to know there’s nothing kerygmatic [not a master-name] about differance, we must perceive its decapita(liza)tion > must put into question the name of the name

DIF.content: there will be no unique name: must think this w/out nostalgia, hors du myth of pure mom/dad language, must affirm like Nietzsche met l’affirmation en jeu, dans un rire et un pas de la danse
DIF.linkedContent: there will be no unique name: must think this w/out nostalgia, hors du myth of pure mom/dad language, must affirm like Nietzsche met l’affirmation en jeu, dans un rire et un pas de la danse
